name: Jonathan Steele
title: Jonathan Steele | Software Engineer
about: Hard of Hearing Professional full-stack Software Engineer passionate about software development and building user-centric applications. I’ve developed a mobile app serving 100+ daily users and business tools using Shell Scripting, JCL, Python, and SQL to save time and reduce errors. With experience in customer service and warehouse operations, I excel in fast-paced, collaborative environments. Let’s connect to create meaningful solutions!
